address: 31 Hurdy Gurdy Lane The Gurdies VIC 3984
description:
FIVE ACRES OF PARADISE!
Located just off the Bass Highway is this ripper block. Big wide frontage and with a sealed road. Fully fenced, new crossover and creek at the rear. Dam to the right of the block. Power and phone available. Gently undulating this block has an excellent building site. Pakenham and Cranbourne 30 mins away. Cowes only 25 mins away. Escape suburbia and enjoy this beautiful setting!

WELL MAINTAINED WITH A WATER VIEW
Presented FOR SALE and located in the up and coming town of Pioneer Bay is this well maintained 3 bedroom 1 bathroom home set on an elevated block of land capturing a wide view over Westernport Bay. Entering the home you are greeting by an open plan K/L/D area before heading down the hallway to the separate laundry, bedrooms and family bathroom.Externally the front and rear yard is exceptionally maintained with many mature plants and includes a great size BBQ area. The concrete drive leads to a lockable carport followed by a great size shed

IDEAL 3 BEDROOM 2 BATHROOM HOME
Here is a fantastic opportunity to secure yourself a classic Hardi Plank home situated in a pleasant tree lined street within close proximity to Grantville's amenities including cafes, bakery, bank, post office, newsagents and medical centre. Features three great size bedrooms all with new carpet, a modest living zone, open plan kitchen, separate laundry and double car garage with one bay converted into a home office, rear pergola w decking for entertaining, private garden with many mature fruit trees, plants and flowers this property is suited to someone with an appreciation to gardening.

address: 46 Island View Road The Gurdies VIC 3984
description:
I TIP MY HAT! BEAUTIFUL SUNSETS & WATERVIEWS ARE WAITING FOR YOU
Remarkable renovation to be adored by all. All the work is done, simply sit on the deck and watch the amazing sunsets and waterviews of Westernport bay and French Island over a wine.
This package is on a 715m2 block (approx) allowing room to move.
Modern upgrade to the whole interior, 3 bedrooms, master has a walk in robe. Lovely spacious bathroom with his and hers vanities and shower niche for the shampoo/soap.
Fantastic fresh, light and bright open plan kitchen, dining and lounge room giving that spacious crisp feel. Large new kitchen, walk in pantry, stainless steel dishwasher and cooking appliances, island bench.
New carpet, freshly painted, split system reverse cycle unit and a wood heater, floating floors and parquetry floors.
Outside entertaining with new roofing. Garden and chicken shed, single garage. Central to Wonthaggi, Phillip Island, Pakenham and Cranbourne making life a whole lot easier. Avoid the rat race but be close enough to obtain all your needs.

HIDDEN GEM ON 1/4 ACRE BLOCK
Located in Barker Street is this cosy hardiplank home nestled between established houses and just minutes walk to the local reserve, bowling club, cafe and general store, this 1/4 ACRE block is a hidden gem! The home has the bones of a complete package featuring two great size bedrooms, one large bathroom with separate toilet, open plan kitchen/living with a sizable undercover entertaining deck to the rear! This property offers ample shedding featuring a single carport, garden shed and a large garage with extended workshop.

COASTAL HIDEAWAY ON GRANTVILLE HEIGHTS
Theres never been a better time to escape the city and suburbs to the quiet country/coastal lifestyle this Grantville gem provides.
With a keen eye for both design and comfort, the reluctant vendor stylishly refurbished this low-maintenance 3-bedroom home to enjoy as an idyllic coastal hideaway.
Set high on the hill overlooking Westernport Bay, in a quiet cul-de-sac just 2 minutes drive from Grantville village and foreshore, the property is ready for you to move in with nothing to do but plant some seasonal produce in the veggie garden!
The homes versatile space comprises two double bedrooms with BIRs and central bathroom, a beautifully light and spacious living room enjoying glimpses of the bay, with split-system air conditioner and Coonara wood heater for cosy ambience through the winter months. A separate dining area adjoins both the living room and kitchen, also opening directly to the alfresco BBQ/entertainment deck and back garden.
The bright and airy kitchen is flooded with natural sunlight and opens to another covered deck which can be used for either recreation or vehicle parking, it includes a lockable storage room.
Across this deck is the door to a completely discrete retreat featuring a third double bedroom with robes, bathroom, and a large living room with further access to its own rear patio area. With an access gate at the back of the property this is ideal space for teenagers, guests or to generate income from AirBnB/holiday let.
This delightful home is completed by an outdoor laundry and set in a charming, private back garden
Grantville is the gateway to the stunning Bass Coast, located just 75 minutes from Melbournes CBD and 15 minutes to the beautiful beaches and attractions of Phillip Island. Town amenities include cafes, takeaway food shops, petrol station, bank, post-office, pharmacy and medical centre with a jetty and boat ramp for fishing and water sports.
Call Aminah on 0415 256 578 to book a private or virtual inspection today!

PICTURESQUE HOME IN GREAT LOCATION
Situated on the point at Corinella is this lovely three bedroom, two bathroom brick home with water views on a huge allotment of 809 square metres. Stepping inside the home you enter the main living room with polished timber floors, plenty of natural light, wood heating and views out to the bay. Galley style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, plenty of bench space and dining area overlooking the front garden and views beyond. Yard includes a fabulous 10 x 7 metre boat/work shed with gantry and mezzanine built in.

FORESHORE LIVING WITH SPECTACULAR BAY VIEWS
Beyond the mature native garden is the entry porch which showcases spectacular views over Westernport Bay to French Island! Open plan kitchen/ living area, plus a second living zone both overlook the water views. Great size kitchen with pantry, timber benchtop, 2 good size bedrooms with large BIRs to master, bathroom w separate toilet & laundry. Featuring pine timber floors, split system, wood heater and beautiful timber detailed internal doors. To the rear of the property there is enough parking for multiple cars, as well as a good size garage/workshop and water tanks. This is your opportunity to secure a front row seat on Jam Jerrup's foreshore!

AN ELITE PROPERTY
Held in the same family for over 40 years.
Located just off the South Gippsland Highway between Westernport Road and Caldermeade Road, approx. 70kms from Melbournes South Eastern Suburbs, 35kms from Cranbourne and 60kms to Phillip Island.
Ample water supply with tapped troughs to every paddock, x2 dams, drains, mains water to the dwelling and a seemingly endless bore.
Approx 70 acres (27.79ha) of superb grazing country, ideal for fattening, breeding, equine or cropping.
Highly productive fertile soil, excellent fertiliser history.
Central laneway system servicing all 11 paddocks.
Cattle facilities including disused dairy, holding yards, loading race and a high standard of fencing throughout.
Out buildings - including 2 large haysheds, disused dairy, machinery shed, workshop etc.
Well maintained 3 bedroom brick home with spacious lounge (sfh), country kitchen with gas cooking and dishwasher, surrounded by established trees and gardens plus detached fully self-contained bungalow currently leased at $200pw.

address: 30A Gurdies-St Helier Road The Gurdies VIC 3984
description:
"Under Contract"
This immaculate and tastefully renovated 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home with self-contained bungalow (extra bedroom and bathroom) offers supreme bay views on 2 charming elevated acres. Manicured gardens and designated horse paddocks with associated outbuildings are key features. All only a moments drive from Grantville and 15 minutes from San Remo & Phillip Island.
Overlooking Westernport Bay across to French Island and beyond, this idyllic lifestyle property delivers serene country living with coastal outlook. Polished boards and a crisp white palette enhance the open plan design of the kitchen/dining and living area which all capture the breathtaking bay views first-hand through large floor to ceiling windows. The custom-built kitchen includes stainless steel appliances and oversees the dining area, stepping out to the alfresco entertainment patio where the panoramic bay views can really be enjoyed. The carpeted lounge shares the amazing vista and includes wood heater and split system for all year comfort.
The master bedroom includes walk in robe, reverse cycle split system with ensuite and the second bedroom is spoilt for views also. The generous laundry with ample storage has direct access to an additional private garden and carport.
The nearby bungalow adds a third bedroom and bathroom and is fully self-contained; perfect for guest accommodation or even as a teenage retreat.
Set high on a pristine 2 acres of landscaped gardens and lawn, inclusive of well-tended roses and vegetable garden, this spectacular property includes white fenced horse paddocks, round yard, sand pit, horse box, tack room and convenient access into The Gurdies National Park for trail riding and bush walking. The acreage also includes a generous insulated shed and workshop with water and power connected, a detached 3 vehicle carport with extra height, double carport off the home and a further five sheds throughout the property- so plenty of space for gardening and farming equipment.
Three water tanks support this generous property and sweeping driveway ensure easy mobility and space for extra vehicles.
The Gurdies offers the best of both worlds when it comes to country/coastal lifestyle. Surrounded by serene bushland, yet with uninterrupted water views the property sits ideally between Melbourne and Phillip Island.
Inspect by appointment Garth Lisle Property Consultants are open 7 days and welcome your enquiry.

Stylish Living on 1087sqm
Set on a huge 1087 sqm block, walking distance to school, shops and transport this neat and tidy 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is set to impress. With a massive outdoor entertaining area, parking for a caravan or boat and established gardens, this home wants for nothing.
The master bedroom is complemented by a walk-in robe and ensuite and its own private garden/courtyard. The remaining 2 bedrooms have built-in robes and are serviced by a classic family bathroom with claw foot tub.
The open plan living area is flooded with natural light from the huge feature windows and port holes, and overlook and open to the expansive outdoor living area.
The kitchen is spacious and practical with stainless appliances, dishwasher, lots of prep space and plentiful cabinetry.
Year-round comfort is provided with the feature wood fire and multiple split system units - including in the bedrooms.
Outside is the grand outdoor entertaining area, flowing seamlessly from inside, making indoor/outdoor living a breeze. With feature garden beds, pergola and screens it works for all year round.
A double garage, and huge back yard with multiple fruit trees completes the package - move in and enjoy with nothing to do.

Peaceful Cottage Gardens
WE ARE ACTIVE FOR APPRAISALS AND INSPECTIONS.
Located on the high side in a quiet cul de sac with filtered views to Western Port Bay and French Island, this cute 3 bedroom dwelling with cottage gardens is waiting for the right person to give it the love it deserves.
The cosy kitchen has electric cooking, original floorboards in the open plan living area with high ceilings and small exposed beams, adding some character to the home. There is carpet in the bedrooms and large windows to let in the light, all the necessities are there for living in while you refurbish and bring this house back to its former glory. The mantle-piece in the lounge is an appealing feature. Restoration maybe needed to bring the fire place back to workable condition. There is also a split system heating/cooling unit in the lounge to keep the temperature at desired levels.
Outside the house is well maintained and re-painted. The generous back deck has enough room for table, chairs and a bbq. The yard is private with an abundance of mixed plants and flowers perfect for the avid gardener. Sitting on the front veranda and watching the glorious sunsets over the bay would be one of your favourite things to do on the warm summer evenings. The property is in the perfect location, within 2 minutes drive to the water and amenities on offer at Grantville including Post Office, Chemist, Doctor, Ambulance Depot, Cafes, Bakery and more. Major shopping centres and Phillip Island are all within half an hour, and dual lane Bass Highway makes the commute easy to any destination.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

QUALITY FAMILY HOME WITH A VIEW
We welcome your inspection of this quality family home in the bayside township of Pioneer Bay. Situated in an elevated position of the town, it offers the ideal lifestyle opportunity, only a short stroll over to the community park, the school bus stop and the foreshore boardwalk. Pioneer Bay is set for an upgrade with a notice currently in place to seal the roads which will improve the streetscape with footpaths, better drainage and capital improvement. Externally the home has very attractive mature plantings, concrete driveway, gate access to the rear yard which is perfect for the dogs, large lock up garage, paved barbeque area, fruit trees, olive trees and plenty of room for the kids to run around on the grass.

30 Acre Hobby Farm Offering Loads Of Privacy & Seclusion.
(1P2781)
Located close to the end of a no through road and surrounded by other large acreage properties is this great hobby farm set on approx. 30acres.
With quality undulating pastures offering loads of feed this property was originally setup for running cattle, but with the great paddock arrangement that is currently in place it would also well suit someone with horses.
With features such as;
- Quality built 3 bedroom family home with views from every window.
- Master with full ensuite & WIR.
- Bedrooms 2 & 3 with BIR's.
- Open plan kitchen and dining area adjacent to the family room.
- Wide front and rear verandas.
- 3.4kw solar power with great payback.
- Fenced to 6 large paddocks, all with water, and also a stock ramp and yards.
- Ample water supply with tanks, 3 dams & bore.
- Various shedding the main workshop has electricity and concrete floor.
- Only 5mins to Lang Lang town centre and a little over 1 hour to Melbourne.
With so much on offer and with genuine sellers, an inspection is a must as this one won't last long!
